name: Ohana - Toasted Marshmallows - 4x44
additionalNotes: Ohana Cigars is a brand that celebrates the collaboration between two families, Madison Money (262 Cigars) and Ryan Rodriguez (Ohana Cigars). Both Ohana and 262 were founded by parents and children, and together they wanted to honor that connection. The brand considers that Ohana Nui represents the spirit of companionship, brotherhood, friendship and family. Ohana Nui embodies love and passion for cigars.
